website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive 1/4-inch hex shank arbor that will fit most standard hole saws.
pros: An effective arbor that fits most standard hole saws
cons: Some buyers felt that this option didn't hold as much torque as a standard hole saw arbor
A few reports of this option breaking easily

customer_reviews.title: Works well with 20v impact!
customer_reviews.text: I Love the fact this fits in an impact allowing me to carry just one drill, however my one concern is the tiny allen set screw for the pilot bit has a tendency to tweak offsetting the pilot bit. Drilled 30 - 40 7/8 hole's daily through 18g metal with this arbor for couple weeks. There is a version that has a larger slotted set screw adjusted with a flat tip screw driver that holds up well!, I quite frankly wasn't paying attention when I ordered these. To date I haven't found the correct part / model number for that particular slotted set screw.
customer_reviews.author: SparkyLV

customer_reviews.title: Pilot Bit is not as pictured - A Black oxide pilot bit comes with this set
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't use black oxide bits as most of my work is on steel & the black oxide bits tend to break or wear far more faster. This M.K. MORSE 1/4" QC 1/2-20 ARBOR item displays a silver, either stainless or nickel coated high speed bit, yet the product I received (I ordered 2) are black oxide pilot drill bits. Not what I ordered or expected.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Now, everything works with my 1/4-inch impact driver!
customer_reviews.text: I switched the arbor in my hole saw set to this one. Now it works perfectly with my impact driver. Before this, I would carry a regular drill to use my hole saws.
customer_reviews.author: Su Doki

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles.
customer_reviews.text: Does not run true. Drill and shank are not concentric. Drill bit out of round at tip by 1/8" easy. I was in a bind and kept it anyway, I had to bore some holes. I purchased their hole saw and it was OK, but this mandrel was not ok for a US made product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It worked well for me.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for the task for which I purchased it. However, my task did not involve much torque. It seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Josedude

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Arbor was delivered quickly and seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rnewton

customer_reviews.title: Handy Handy
customer_reviews.text: good for use with 1/4" extension for through hole penetrations with small hole saw
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works with MK Morse MHS09 Bi-Metal Hole Saw, 9/16" Diameter
customer_reviews.text: the two pieces worked great together to put in my front door peep-hole
customer_reviews.author: kevin m williams

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Arbor
customer_reviews.text: It's an arbor without peer. Perfect in every way imaginable.
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Made my job a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: Fits hole saw perfectly. Sharp bit and the price is on point!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: chucks rite up in your impact. very hard to find just don't let your apprentice use it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, very brittle!
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t even last three seconds! Used it (or should I say meant to use it) with dewalt impact driver to make a hole in a 2x4 stud, when it broke!
customer_reviews.author: Hpoury

customer_reviews.title: Does what it do
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two 1/4” hex bit arbors for work both are good quality pairs well with my 1/4” hex extension
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke during first use
customer_reviews.text: Broke during first use while cutting a hole in a desktop. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Laura

customer_reviews.title: THIS DEFINATLEY AN AMERICAN COMPANY THAT "CARES A LOT" !
customer_reviews.text: ARBOR CAME WELL PACKED IN IT'S OWN BOX. BOX WAS GLUED GOOD EACH END, FOR MAXIMUM PROTECTION. A FULL EXPLANATION ON BOX TO SHOW WHAT DRILL SIZES IT FIT.
customer_reviews.author: FAIR WINDS AND FOLLOWING SEAS

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a good, sturdy product. Unfortunately, it's too small for my hole saw and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Schuchman

product_meta.title: M.K. MORSE 1/4" QC 1/2-20 ARBOR
product_meta.description: Introducing the all new advanced Bi-Metal hole saw by Morse. Our latest sawing innovation replaces all current Morse Bi-Metal hole saw solutions into one, simple optimized powerhouse.
feature_bullets: Patent Pending tooth set design optimized to remove material faster
Kit conveniently organizes and stores sizes pros need
New side slot increased leverage for faster, easier slug removal
New exterior red coating reduces side wall friction for efficient cutting
Heavy duty .050 side wall for greater stability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
